title.rendered: 2022 US Open Tennis Travel Package Rates

content.rendered:
2022 US Open Tennis Getaway Rates

Rates based on a package including two nights hotel stay and tickets in Arthur Ashe Stadium for one session. Customize your package with hospitality, extra nights, extra sessions, room upgrades and other add-ons.
Program HotelsPackages from
Courtyard Midtown East $745
New York Marriott Marquis
$875
Lexington Hotel, Autograph Collection$955
Ritz-Carlton, Central Park$1,665
Contact our sports travel specialists for your custom trip quote.
*Rates are per person in USD based on double occupancy. Single occupancy rates are available. Triple and Quad occupancy may be available. A 25% deposit will hold your spot. The balance will not be due until 90 days prior to departure. Rates include all local and state taxes. Availability and pricing subject to change prior to booking.

2022 US Open Tennis Semifinals and/or Finals Package Rates

Rates based on a package including two nights hotel stay and tickets for one day. Customize your package with hospitality, extra nights, extra sessions, room upgrades and other add-ons.
Program HotelsPackages from
Courtyard Midtown East $945
New York Marriott Marquis
$1,075
Lexington Hotel, Autograph Collection$1,155
Ritz-Carlton, Central Park$1,865
Contact our sports travel specialists for your custom trip quote.
*Rates are per person in USD based on double occupancy. Single occupancy rates are available. Triple and Quad occupancy may be available. A 25% deposit will hold your spot. The balance will not be due until 90 days prior to departure. Rates include all local and state taxes. Availability and pricing subject to change prior to booking.
